website_summaries.verdict: While most diets are geared towards women, this approach is designed to appeal to men. It offers a balanced approach to eating.
pros: Gives you tips on food problems to avoid
Tells Curry's story of weight loss
Lots of practical advice for incorporating a  healthy diet with a modern lifestyle
cons: The recipes will likely have you needing to pick up a couple of items at the grocery to make, but he does offer substitutes if you can't find or don't prefer certain ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Great meal prep and overall health book!
customer_reviews.text: i copyedited this book! In all my years of copyediting and proofreading, this is the first cookbook I've worked on that I've bought a copy of, so you know I like it! The author's take on fitness and overall physical and mental health is great, and his smile and positive attitude are infectious. The recipes are delicious, nutritious, and easy to cook and offer a lot of variations to change things up. They are the perfect size to meal prep for one or two people and reheat well. I highly recommend this book! :-D Oh yes, and the photos are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: almare2

customer_reviews.title: Book is missing 20 pages! How???!!
customer_reviews.text: I love FitMenCook recipes but disappointed that my book is missing 20 pages. It literally jumps from page 142 to 161. I added a pic and vid to show this. I reached out to Kevin Curry via instagram but I didn't get a response. I'm sure he's busy but I'd love a resolution. Only giving 3 stars because I have an incomplete book.
customer_reviews.author: Trust the Process

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you how excited I am to FINALLY have this book in my hands. My husband and I have been following Kevin for years and it almost feels like he’s one of our friends who’s doing big things. (He’s just that friendly in his posts) Although we don’t actually know him, we can still say his recipes have been delicious since the day we found his IG and his positivity and kindness are really genuine. The tips for the recipes are so helpful and the food is just freaking delicious. Thanks to Kevin for such a tasty and healthy cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Osev

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Recipes and Great All-Around Book!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking forward to this book since it was announced over a year ago. Anyone who follows Kevin on social media and has tried his recipes know they are inexpensive and tasty alternatives to the traditional chicken, broccoli, and rice so many health conscious people consistently make. The book is great quality - informative, easy to follow, and has beautiful pictures of almost every dish. Inside you will find 100 recipes that look delicious! I was worried this would just be the app in book format and it's not -- lots of new material here! A perfect complement to the Fit Men Cook app!
customer_reviews.author: Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: You Gotta Love Kevin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got a zillion cookbooks, but none of them make me smile like this one does. Kevin’s positive attitude and enthusiasm for life and health oozes from the cover to the back of this culinary masterpiece! What is so cool is that he has something for everyone—vegetarian? No problem. Meat? Fish. No problem! With some cookbooks it feels like a chore to cook and prep, but Kevin has put the cool back in cooking. Thanks Kevin, for brightening my kitchen and caring about my health. And a BIG HUG to your doggie (how many times do you actually see a pet in a cookbook)!
customer_reviews.author: BronxGal57

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok book, but I mean really it goes way out there in trying to use ingredients that most people dont have. 2 stars because I like his Youtube channel, but the book isn't good for me
customer_reviews.author: C.A

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping professional follow up from the author
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an extra gift for my husband/me. I'm excited to try out some recipes!! The book came on time as promised I even got a follow up email from the author thanking us for our purchase. I follow him on Instagram and everything I've seen so far looks healthy and tastey 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: This man and his book are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Kevi Curry is amazing. He is on Instagram @fitmencook as well as on youtube, and he has an app to help you out with your goals. I love with this book, it really is stunning. This book is so well organized and is great for beginners as well as those of us who are just looking to up our meal prep game. The photos are beautiful, recipes are amazing, he gives substitution ideas, and he went above and beyond by listing the macros to make your life even easier. Get the book, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Scelluet

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this book and this chef. I've been on a 80lb weight loss journey and Kevin helped me learn that good food doesn't need to taste bad! I've made 4 of his recipies in this book and i loved everyone of them! Not only are the recipies taste great, the book is designed and photographed so well. Im graphic designer, so I can say, this is the most well thought out and designed cook book I've ever owned! I wish I can give this book a 10 instead of 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Diana Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: SO much useful info!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a gigantic fan of Fit Men Cook and agreethat meal prepping is one of the best things that everyone can do to improve their health for the long haul. So much passion has gone into this book, from the meal prep education to the recipe portion. My husband has been reading through the recipes and has already made a couple lunches that he LOVES. There’s plenty of character and flavor in these recipes, and I love that many of them are a healthier take on things we already love, like Mexican food. This book’s 100% worth a purchase for anyone who wants to improve their health without sacrificing that FLAVOR.
customer_reviews.author: April Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Kevin is the best!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kevin’s fans can confirm that he is the real deal! I’ve been following him on social media for quite some time and I already use his recipe app, so excited to have his first cookbook now too!!!!!! He is so inspiring and his love for people and food shines bright in this book! The recipes are healthy, colorful, and exactly what I needed to take my kitchen game to the next level. Just buy it already!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Book the WHOLE family loves
customer_reviews.text: This book is wonderful. The author starts out telling his story which draws you in and makes you like him even more! He then moves on to food prep and recipes. We just got this book and have tried a new recipe each night. EVERY recipe has been a family "keeper." Our new favorite cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: Received the book today. Came home and read the first part. Increíble journey and easy read. Kevin is inspirational, real and honest. His form of transforming ordinary prepping meals to mouth watering experience is one that so far has been increíble. Revolutionary and inspiring.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great for all "Chef Levels"
customer_reviews.text: LOVED all of the photos and how easy of a read this book is. The information is golden, and would probably cost you hundreds of dollars if you paid a professional (or hours of time if your YouTube-ing skills are average). I follow the author on YT and IG, and there's more free content there if you need more inspiration! Overall very pleased with my purchase and will be sharing with my family for the holidays, maybe it will inspire them to cook more too :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Your meal prep is boring if you dont have this book!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re tired of the same ‘ol boring meal prep that wont break the bank, this is for you. Kevin shows how to create flavorful dishes while keeping it simple. Enjoyed the recipes as well as the modifications. Kevin also has different meal plans included such as “on a tight budget” & “the bachelor(ette)” just so name a couple. He also explains dieting pitfalls that are definitely worth reading. I mean who wants to meal prep and not reach their goals? Lol Thank You Kevin. God bless.
customer_reviews.author: Sharde B

customer_reviews.title: Few Recipes are Actually for Meal Preps
customer_reviews.text: For a book about meal prepping, I was surprised and disappointed to discover that so few of the recipes are suitable for meal prepping. Many are to be served "immediately," and only 1/5 can be portioned and frozen. If you are looking for a general healthy eating cookbook, you may find this one useful (though there are many books available for that purpose). If you are looking for a good variety of in-advance meal preps, you will find far fewer hear than the cover and blurb would lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: After following his page on Instagram and constantly posting, "You should make a cookbook" He finally decided to make one, an actual book since most people just make e-books now. The recipes are definitely not boring, so much variety, even the photography is really nice (if that's your thing). The book is just so nicely put together overall. Makes a great gift (especially since it isn't that expensive) for friends, family, or yourself. Can't wait for the next book he publishes
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Cookbook Lacks Tasty Recipes
customer_reviews.text: I tried a number of different recipes and every time I was not satisfied with the results. I am not a picky eater and will eat most anything, but when I followed the recipe as written the seasonings and combinations are not that appetizing and I end up tossing out what I made and bought lunch instead (my wife was super surprised). There are a few good recipes, but the gems are few and far between, for me the information on meal prep and fitness can be easily found on blogs. I was so excited for this book when it arrived, but I was let down immensely by the lack of quality of the recipes that I made.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Harbison

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Kevin Curry is so fun to watch in the Fit Men Cook video series. It is wonderful to have the recipes already written down. He not only gives direction about how to prepare the food but the hows and whys of eating well. He also threw in some personal history which is fun to read. Great cookbook. I hope to change my eating habits and feel his foresight and recipes will help me on my way to health.
customer_reviews.author: The Tamster

customer_reviews.title: Practical recipes
customer_reviews.text: Flavorful food with easy to acquire ingredients. I was impressed with the simplicity of the recipes. A lot of other meal prep recipes you will spend the entire day preparing, most of these are not time consuming at all.
customer_reviews.author: JODY OAKS

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down Best Cookbook Ever
customer_reviews.text: Kevin is a mastermind with meal prep, bought this for my husband as the man can eat chicken, rice, and broccoli for every meal. I on the other need some variety and this book inspired us both! It's rare that I buy cookbooks but this was well worth the money and it looks beautiful. Everyone who comes over likes to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: HNW

customer_reviews.title: Great meal prepping book
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift, I was actually surprised how many recipes looked really interesting when I peeked through it. I don't use instagram so I didnt know the author was an influencer, I was just looking for meal prepping recipe books. I'm going to reorder this book for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: If you love his instagram and website and app you’ll love his book
customer_reviews.text: Love the book almost as much as I love his instagram. I also bought because I wanted to support Kevin. He is so inspirational and motivational about the food and his travels on instagram I can almost say no need to buy the. Ok when he has a website and instagram but he has recipe here that don’t show up in either. just an FYI these recipe count low on weight watchers too
customer_reviews.author: M. Husseini

customer_reviews.title: Inspiring Healthy Meals
customer_reviews.text: I came across this book on Amazon and have used Kevin's app for some time for looking up healthy recipes or new ideas for dinner. I wanted to show my support and have a nice book to feature in my kitchen! For those of you who have not tried any of the recipes from 'Fit Men Cook' I strongly suggest giving them a look (it's not just for men). I've enjoyed going on a mini culinary trip through Kevin's recipes and my favorite so far is the pineapple and peppers asian chicken dish. I've received multiple compliments on some of the dishes I've prepared and I'm by no means a chef. Hats off to Kevin for some inspiring meals.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Iovino

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I really wanted to like this cookbook but ever recipe is absolutely disgusting. Sending back ASAP. Everything we have made makes me want to vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Shabana

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this book! You won’t regret it! Deliciousness is in store for us all!
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled I received my copy of fitmencook. I have been following his account for years on Instagram and every recipe looks better than the last! I don’t purchase many cookbooks anymore but I just had to get this one myself! And I ordered it on Christmas Day after I didn’t receive it from my wishlist! Haha! Couldn’t be more excited to start making these recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This is the ONLY cookbook you need!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book last week as I have been following fit men cook via IG for a while now. I absolutely love the recipes he shares. The book is so detailed and well written. It’s great for meal prep ideas, specialized diets such as keto, paleo, vegetarian, vegan or GF. Each of the recipe has nutritional info. Plus so many motivation encouraging words from the chef itself. It’s a great book as it’s written from the heart. Def worth purchasing!!! There recipes are simple and easy to prepare!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse4Life

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Excellent! Easy! A must have for health and weight loss.
customer_reviews.text: This book is fantastic! really good recipes. Everything I have made is delicious and healthy and easy to make. I will be using these recipes from now on as part of our journey to better health. my husband and I are both thrilled with all our new healthy meal choices. We were getting tired of our over used ones. Best healthy recipes I’ve found! I hope he writes another one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Loving this book so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve followed Kevin Curry for years now and have always wished for a cookbook. Now it’s here, and it does NOT disappoint! It is very thorough, has something for EVERYONE. I love that it gives ideas for sides cus that’s always where I lose creativity. Between the app and this book, I am set. I use this book to cook for my whole family. The ingredients aren’t complicated, the instructions are easy... once you get a handful of pantry ingredients, you’re set. Get this book!!
customer_reviews.author: Jade L.

customer_reviews.title: Great book full of great healthy recipes and habits
customer_reviews.text: I have been an early adapter of Fit Men Cook. Kevin is simply a pure genius. Every ingredients he proposes in his recipes have a purpose. This ingredient instead of that ingredient because it is healthier for you for this or for that reason. His FitMenCook app on iOS is simply hands down the best healthy cooking tool in the App Store. Super well designed. Also his spices are really good. Great job keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: David Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Easy...fast...healthy...delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This recipe book is awesome. Kevin Curry makes meal prepping so easy and he proves it again with his first new cookbook. I'm so happy I bought this cookbook. So far I've cooked the sweet potato lasagna and the low carb jambalaya and they did not disappoint. I love that his recipes call for easy to get ingredients and recipes are easy to make. I highly recommend this cookbook. HIGHLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Torres

customer_reviews.title: Unique and inspiring (also mouth watering)
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy this book! A cousin introduced Kevin on social media a while back and I’ve been a huge fan ever since. I like his approach to “healthy eating doesn’t have to equal boring.” I gained a lot of weight when I was pregnant with my little girl and have lost well over 40 lbs while following a lot of his recipes so, naturally, I was really excited when he released his book. Looking forward to making more of his awesome recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Campos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  recipes that do not require you to have a culinary degree!!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever do reviews but I have to say 20 cook books later this is a cook book that I can actually use. It has lots of easy recipes that work with things I had in my kitchen. I actually read the first 30 pages which were filled with great tips on the meal prep and healthy lifestyle tips. And I made the BBQ Chicken Teriaki and it was easy to make and delicious. Awesome meal prep cook book.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: A Wealth of Great Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this book months ago & me and my wife are still trying recipes out of this book. Most of the recipes definitely have a southwestern influence, but as a guy, they are easy to shop for, and easy to prepare in the kitchen. Some of them aren't the best calorie-wise, but the food is good & doesn't lack flavor
customer_reviews.author: Craigy P

customer_reviews.title: Cook book
customer_reviews.text: I saw the author on Good Morning America and was interested in the two dishes he made. I was disappointed that the recipes weren't in the book.
customer_reviews.author: Trenna Hall

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got my copy yesterday and could not put it down. I have been following Kevin for years on social media. He is awesome. I love the way he break down meal prepping. If you are a beginner or advanced there is something to learn. The book does a great job of explaining meal prepping. The recipes are never boring. I love how the meals can be modified. He also does a good job of challenging people to try new ingredients. Awesome book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite healthy cookbook.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of health food cookbooks. I try to make a new recipe every week. This cookbook stand far above the others in terms of practical ingredients and amazing taste. Out of all the recipes I have tried over the last year, I haven't yet been disappointed in how any have turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookbook !
customer_reviews.text: I had preordered the book a few months ago and was very excited to get it on its release date. It actually exceeded my expectations- delicious recipes ( which I already knew from using the FitMenCook app), calorie count and macros, and absolutely beautiful photography. Whether you are an experienced food prepped or a newbie, you need this book in your collection.
customer_reviews.author: ChunkyMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Everyone be fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this cook book. I actually purchased for my teen as a Christmas gift. The recipes are amazing and not complicated to prepare. In less than 70 days I've lost 13 lbs by meal prepping and cooking at home with my family. You may find additional recipes on Fitmencook.com or his instagram page. This would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: RH24

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book. I saw the author on Rachel Ray, and thought he was great! Seriously, he is worth following on Instagram etc. Some of these recipes are very basic, but they are good recipes that you can then jazz up on your own. Others are truly unique & delicious. I would recommend checking this guy out for sure....and would certainly recommend supporting him on his journey by purchasing this book!
customer_reviews.author: LivyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like??!!?
customer_reviews.text: This back has EVERYTHING - lots of great pictures, interesting (and good) advice, a variety of food choices, very informative and well put together. I enjoyed Kevin's book and great smile. Highly recommended for males and females alike! I look forward to more books (hint, hint).
customer_reviews.author: Ama_customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Recipes Have Non-Standard Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: The pictures alone will make you hungry! I'm sure these dishes taste great but I'm a non-foodie, comfort food loving gal. I had to google several of the recipe ingredients to find out what they are. Ended up returning the book.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Gal

customer_reviews.title: Best cook book ever
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of Kevin Curry and this book didn't dissapoint. Amazing recipes athat are easy to make, healthy and delicious. I've been meal prepping my lunches now, losing weight and feeling healthy. I can't reccomend this book highly enough. It's a 10 star and everyones must have cook book
customer_reviews.author: David Paul Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for this Meal Prep Beginner
customer_reviews.text: This book isn't just a book of recipes; it offers a lot of really helpful tips and some good inspiration as well. Of course the recipes are good and consistent with what you see on the FitMenCook app, but I like having these things written out in a book. It makes it much easier to use when cooking as opposed to checking my phone when I can't remember something. Also the book just looks very nice as well! Overall I'd recommend it to someone who is still learning how to effectively meal prep to meet their goals.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Busting with great content. More than just a prep/cook book. If you’re not familiar with Kevin Curry check out “Fit Men Cook” on YouTube. Now the book itself my only disappointment is with the spine. It is stiffer than a normal hard back in my opinion and is constantly wanting to close.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: easy, approachable and flavorful!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious recipes! I love that Kevin makes healthy eating easy, approachable and flavorful! The book is organized nicely and has lots of fun, colorful photos. I’m looking forward to making his avocado tzatziki chicken salad this week!
customer_reviews.author: mch

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't really what I was expecting in a cookbook. Some of the ingredients are a little too fancy for my grocery store visits. None of the recipes really stuck out to me as something I would like to try.
customer_reviews.author: The Pearl

customer_reviews.title: EASY UNIQUE RECIPES
customer_reviews.text: Banana corn waffles...sounds weird?...FABULOUS! #BOOM! Great recipes. Works GREAT with Weight Watchers Free Style. Some ingredients tweaked slightly to lower Smart Point values. Love the recipes. Only con (and it has NOTHING to do with the recipes) is that the book cover photo looks over exposed. Get better photographer next time.
customer_reviews.author: StarGazer76

customer_reviews.title: The flavor combinations aren’t for everyone
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful book, but my family did not care for any of the recipes that I cooked from it. If you aren’t a huge fan of cumin and smoked paprika, this is probably not the cookbook for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G Jones

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing purchase. I just received it and I am beyond impressed on the quality of the book Kevin has produced. The design, the concept, the content, everything is on point. I really have to say he has outdone himself. I can’t wait to sit down and devour it both the content as well as the yummy recipes. I’m sure will become a tool and a bible for so many people around the world. And I also have to add that it is gorgeous. What a beautiful book. For real.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Lafaurie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing book
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book! All recipes are very well explain and are easy to cook. Book has beautiful photography and great tips to follow and stay on track with your fitness goals. The book includes a wide variety of recipes that aren’t plain or boring at all, most importantly are delicious, healthy and fit! 😋 Now I can cook veggies and other food in different and delicious ways. I’ve been following Kevin since 2 years ago and I knew I had to buy this book as soon as it was launched, Kevin’s recipes are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. No one can afford all the crazy ingredients that go into these recipes. Should have known better
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Deiwtt

customer_reviews.title: Great book! Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Have already made so many recipes and they are all amazing and healthy. My favorite part is the macros included on the bottom for everything. It's an easy way to see what you're getting each time. The design is also gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Simple, healthy recipes with a good narrative behind them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend because he loves healthy meal prep. He enjoys the options listed in the book and the other useful tips provided.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth A Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great book! This is the second cookbook that I have bought by Kevin. All of the recipes that I have tried and made for other people are an instant hit, with everyone wondering “how do you make this?”. I expect nothin less from this book. It even gives Kevin’s testimony which is a captivating read in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Beerman

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to cook
customer_reviews.text: I've watched a friend and influencer make delicious meals from this book for months, so I don't know what took me so long to buy it myself. Bought one for myself and one as a gift of good, balanced and quick recipes.
customer_reviews.author: That Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipe Book
customer_reviews.text: I have been following him for years now. He has helped me soo much when it comes to meal prepping so I thought it was only right to support him and buy his book. The book is great and includes things that are not on his instagram page. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit men cook recipes and I really enjoyed that he told stories throughout. Not just a cookbook. I loved it so much I bought another to gift to my sister and she loves it too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing and delicious cook book!
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret buying this cookbook! There are so many delicious and HEALTHY dishes . Another great plus are the beautiful pictures of the meals. I personally prefer cookbooks that are both well written and have a visual to compare to. I also follow him on Instagram where he posts amazing cooking videos!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph and Monica

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of FitmenCook
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been following Fitmen Cook for a few years now. I love his app and was extremely excited when this book came out. My fiancé and I love just love all the recipes and can’t wait to make every single one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fun meal prep meals
customer_reviews.text: What a great book. So easy to follow these simple recipes. Helping me out totally in my weight loss journey. I’ve never been to interested in cooking to meal prep but this book totally changed that. I have my coworkers asking me what that amazing aroma is when I heat up my food. I direct them to this book and suggest they try it out
customer_reviews.author: David Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Support this Dallas Boy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been following Kevin Curry on Instagram for a few years now. I’ve always been impressed with his creativity when it comes to cooking healthy. Anyone can cook his food and enjoy it! This cookbook is beautifully photographed and has an inspiring section where Kevin shares his story. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: W GRANT DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook.
customer_reviews.text: Great cookbook. The book is easy to follow, he doesn’t use hard to get ingredients. I find it’s about 5 to 10 steps to prepare the meals, he also gives you nutrition amounts and very nice photos.
customer_reviews.author: kim spencer

customer_reviews.title: If you fail to plan, you plan to fail but you won’t fail with this book!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been following Fit Men Cook on Facebook and have the app, so I had to buy the book! It was a gift for my 16 year old daughter who likes to meal prep but our whole family is reading this cookbook. We all plan meals so we can keep on track with our health and fitness goals. The recipes and photos are wonderful and we can’t wait to try them out!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Rogers

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I preordered this! Kevin’s story is relatable and inspirational. I am definitely more motivated to live a healthy lifestyle after reading this. I’ve already tried 5 or 6 recipes and can’t wait to try more! The sweet potato lasagna is BOMB!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra O.

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I have followed fit men cook on Instagram for awhile now and have tried some of those recipes in the past. I can’t wait to try some from this book ! It’s well made, sturdy and has a LOT of recipes. Worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: heather mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Love the storyline and the recipes are amazing. Lol hard to choose just one to start with. Kevin put his hear and soul into this. I've just started following the mediterranean diet and looking forward to trying out some of those dishes. Lastly in hopes that Mr. C would put together a mediterranean inspired cookbook soon. Thank you Kevin!
customer_reviews.author: linda kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this cookbook! The directions are clear! I appreciate the time the author put in with explaining meal prepping and what is needed to be successful! I have become a meal prep junkie because of this cook book!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 40 Lbs and counting since October 2018
customer_reviews.text: I've been following FITMEN since 2018. I decided to get his book when I changed my lifestyle. Best decision ever. Down to earth recipes. CONGRATULATIONS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality of this product! I love hardcover books and the price for this book was very reasonable. I got it for my boyfriends 20th birthday because he’s into Keto and eating healthier and the reviews of this author (and book) were great. We both enjoy utilizing the recipes in this book as well as how to safely and efficiently practice meal prepping and proper dieting to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Shylynne Koon

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a lot of meal prep books and most have the same recipes in them. It’s great to see a different newer take on meal prep and not the same ole stuff. Graphics are great and I feel the start of the book, Kevin was actually talking to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meals for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I recently became a vegan and I needed recipes. Kevin has made recipes for me and I also have meals I can cook for my family (who are not vegan). This book has everyone in mind and the pictures look so delicious I can eat it right off the page!
customer_reviews.author: Earl McNary

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy all the recipes!! We have been following fit men for a really long time & we love his food and he insights regarding Nutrition and health!
customer_reviews.author: twinky

customer_reviews.title: Best cookbook ever
customer_reviews.text: Love Kevin Curry! I have his app and use his recipes all of the time. I am bodybuilding and have been struggling with losing interest in my diet. Kevin does healthy tweaks to the recipes to make them more interesting than traditional healthy foods. I love his attitude and him in general.
customer_reviews.author: Why am I forced to put a name

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love Kevin Curry’s brand and I am inspired by his life, so I just bought his book to support him. I have only tried the Moroccan Chicken and it was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Rocquelle Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely laid out (organized) and photographed. The recipes look delicious, but I haven’t dug into that yet. My opinion, this is an inspiring book.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book to help with different types of meal prep food ideas. Got tired of eating rice all the time! This weeks recipes have been fabulous! So much flavor. I cant wait to keep cooking up the recipes! I highly recommend this cookbook if you are looking for something different and fun with meal prepping.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Fincher

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Been following him for a long time! Glad to have a hard copy of his recipes! He explains what to eat & why then gives easy clear instructions how to make the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Miami

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been following Kevin on Instagram for awhile now and love all the color and flavor he uses when he cooks. So the moment the cookbook came out I had to order it! I love all the pictures and the layout of the book is awesome. I love how before the recipes start, he really opens up about his journey and makes it clear that not everyone’s health and wellness journey is the same. I can’t wait to get to cooking my way through the book!
customer_reviews.author: Gina S

customer_reviews.title: Bad A$$ Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today 9/24/20 The recipes look healthy and delicious tho... I'll update once I try a few rec
customer_reviews.author: NeNee77

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to meal prepping now
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is awesome. So far I’ve had it for 2 weeks and I look forward to meal prepping now. He breaks everything down and makes it easy. The recipes I have tried so far have taught me something new and they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prep beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Great book! Filled with tasty recipes and beautiful pictures! The first bit of the book is composed of tips and tricks for meal prepping. If you’re a fan of the app or new to meal prepping, you’ll love the book!
customer_reviews.author: Kenner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, easy recipes and encouragement to get to a healthier lifestyle, love it, bought 2 extra copies for Christmas presents. Congratulations Kevin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good
customer_reviews.text: Just like his app, great recipes and easy to understand. A great book to start eating healthier and understand how to cook
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Pete

customer_reviews.title: Details
customer_reviews.text: I love it, is very detailed my favorite part is how many options he gives for people who are dairy free or gluten free, also the portions for individual and families. Congrats Kevin I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marce Smitherman

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are generally easy to assemble and keep well. Common ingredients that are easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Rainie N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon ng.. must buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book and amazing food. I love Kevin and his innovative ideas to ensure the meals are never bland or boring. I 💯 recommend this for anyone strugglimg with meal prep or just ideas for what to make. This is my savior in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Soledad

customer_reviews.text: I hope you do another book I love love love it!! Very creative and so healthy. This is my favorite book by far. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great book... but the pages were bound to the book inverted
customer_reviews.text: The book is fine, but when I open what should be the first page, I am looking at an upside-down index page which is meant to be the last few pages of the book. It's like someone flipped the pages 180 degrees and then threw the cover on. What's up with that?
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get better than this :)
customer_reviews.text: This book is actually my first recipe book and I must say it’s amazing!! I been using Kevin’s recipes for about a year now from his wonderful app Fitmen Cook but now that I have the book right in my kitchen it makes cooking easier. I highly recommend buying this book especially for you want to enjoy a yummy healthy diet
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln A.

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes, lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: This book is amazing so far. I love the diversity of the recipes everything I've made so far tastes fantastic. Would have never been able to step this far out of the "grilled chicken with rice and broccoli" box without this book! Also I love the illustrations and motivation. Overall just a very fun book to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Making me chef 😁
customer_reviews.text: He covers everything. I was wondering about how much healthy eating would cost, he covers meals on a budget. It's in the section meal on a budget. Cool descriptive steps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cook Book!
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and easy to follow recipes. I really liked the icons next to the recipe name quickly showing "one pot" or "slow cooker". It also has some great general tips about meal planning in general and how to make it easier on your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Got my book today and I’m so excited to get cooking! I’ve tried Fitmencook’s recipes in the past and they were delicious. He had me using healthier ingredients I didn’t even know existed, hello arrowroot! The food pics are beautiful so that helps too 🍽.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Love this cook book. Fit Men has some of the best recipes ever. I could not wait for him to come out with this book after Followed him in IG
customer_reviews.author: heather streible

customer_reviews.title: More of the good stuff
customer_reviews.text: If you follow his IGs (plural), website, app or YouTube channel, you know what to expect. Creativity in his recipies is wild and easy to adjust to fit your macros. Some of the recipies that came from his challenges aren't really for me but it's awesome he's got different people's diet restrictions covered. Really glad he left his job and started this full time a few years back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never boring!!
customer_reviews.text: You can tell that Kevin put his absolute heart and soul into making this cook book. It is a masterpiece!
customer_reviews.author: Alec J. Mckanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Great Recipes! Tons of different healthy options! He also provides some valuable feedback for those who are getting started with meal plans and such!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great book with pictures and instructions
customer_reviews.text: I got this book as a gift, the book has a great value, tons of recipes with detailed instructions and pictures!
customer_reviews.author: katrin

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of easy to make recipes
customer_reviews.text: I've been following Kevin's website for years - although I am female, I love that he offers healthy, easy-to-make recipes. I have already made several recipes in this cookbook and have enjoyed them all. Would highly recommend! If you are a female my only recommendation is to watch the portion sizes though to make sure they fit within your meal plan.
customer_reviews.author: Dragan Dordeski

product_meta.title: Fit Men Cook: 100+ Meal Prep Recipes for Men and Women―Always #HealthyAF, Never Boring
